features: 【Mini Handheld Garment Steamer】Handheld Garment Steamer has sharp corner design, 360 degree ironing without dead angle. Even without an ironing board, it can be easily ironed, with different working modes to deal with various scenarios.(Note:Need to preheat first, gently iron back and forth.)

【Ceramic Panel Heating】The ceramic bottom plate of the portable garment ironing machine is harder than stainless steel, and more scratch-resistant than Teflon board. It can be used for a long time without damaging clothes. The surface is smooth, heats up quickly, slides smoothly to cover the clothes, and quickly removes wrinkles.

【Pointed Curved Design】The front and back sides of the hanging ironing machine panel are designed with water chestnut corners, which can flexibly iron narrow areas such as buttons, plackets and collars, allowing the details to be displayed elegantly.

【Easy to Use】The steam iron is simple and convenient to use. It heats up quickly about 3 minutes after turning it on, then put the clothes on the ironing board or table, use the sprayer (we will give it away for free) to humidify the clothes, and then start ironing. The front and back sides of the panel are designed with water chestnut corners, which can flexibly iron narrow areas such as buttons, plackets and collars.

【Necessary for Family Travel】The handheld mini steam iron is compact in design, small and light, easy to store, exquisite and stylish, very suitable for family and travel use, you can enjoy ironing anytime and anywhere, perfect and stylish travel design, lightweight design, about one The iPhone plus is the size of a mobile phone and can be put down with a backpack, and can be easily stored in any suitcase or carried in a backpack.

【Note】 How to use: This mini iron uses 38W low power, is light and portable, and needs to be preheated for a short period of time after plugging in the power supply (the effect will be better if the preheating time is sufficient). Voltage 110V, power 38W, sufficient preheating time can reach 170°C.

【Note】 The required steam mode is: press the button, water will spray out from the middle outlet, spray evenly on the clothes, and iron gently back and forth. Heat dissipation: You need to turn off the switch, then place it on the heat insulation mat, wait for the temperature to drop before putting it away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this portable iron. It’s perfect for all occasions buisness trips, any trip, even small staycations or if you have a special event it’s so easy to bring. I love this iron it heats up really quick and works great! I would definitely recommend this! Great quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Should have trusted the negative reviews on this useless iron. Never heats up enough to iron properly. Steaming doesn't work. And like all negative the reviews said, it leaks. I've nothing positive to say about this junk!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This little buddy fits perfect in backpack or carryon luggageHeats great for a quick wrinkle free shirt or pants or dress or whateverI will never travel without it again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a steamer - it's a small iron
reviews.reviewText: I bought this based on all of the good reviews for a "travel STEAMER". I have been searching for a small, foldable compact STEAMER and thought I had hit pay dirt! WRONG! There is only one tiny hole in the middle of the iron that releases what can be steam, but is usually a squirt of water.Pros: Size is perfect for travel! So small and handle shifts to make it more compact. It heats up quickly It comes with a silicone cover for the hot part of the ironCons: Not a steamer by any means. Tried it on chiffon and polyester - NOPE no steam. The sprayer for the water is more like a small faucet that dumps big drops of water on your clothes The cord is extremely short There is no stand for this steamer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Heats up fast but the shortest cord in existence
reviews.reviewText: I really liked that this came with a silicone cover to put the hot iron on when you weren't using it and that it has a pointed edge, perfect for hard to reach places. I was right by an outlet and I still had trouble with this reaching what I was ironing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Don’t get to control the heat but for the price and super convenient size - pretty sweet little affordable garment wrinkle fixer for travel and on the go :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars It leaks and does not get hot enough.
reviews.reviewText: I used this product for the first time traveling for work. It leaked on my clothes and did not get hot enough to steam the wrinkles out of my clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not purchase
reviews.reviewText: Wish I had used before the return window closed. Tried over and over with no results. Waste of money.
